name: BusinessFreedomDailyBriefing
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
You are a Heroic Small Business Owner and you are working to be liberated from the CHAOS of working IN your business by creating the necessary Vision, Mission, Values, Systems and Processes. 

The Business On Purpose team is will push your perspective and constantly bust the ceiling of your own upper limit challenge with Real Time insight into Systematizing your Small Business so that you can be liberated from the CHAOS of working IN your business, and be free to make time for what matters most!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
